author: kanagwa
content:
Hey, here is a first version of the faucet for the devnet v1: https://eip4844-faucet.vercel.app/

I decided to use a simple Discord auth requirement instead of twitter. And I didn't include spam prevention requirements for now.
The deployed contracts that drips tokens were:

MultiFaucet: https://github.com/0xGabi/MultiFaucet/blob/master/contracts/src/MultiFaucet.sol

WETH: https://github.com/gnosis/canonical-weth/blob/master/contracts/WETH9.sol

DAI: Openzeppelin ERC20Permit

author: kanagwa
content: <@456226577798135808> let me know if it's all right to keep a similar look to the paradigm site.
